Player History
Signed as a free agent by Chicago on 4/3/1985 to a 1-year deal worth $1,264,000 per year...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/5/1985, off Tom Seaver (PIT)...
Earned first career win on 4/16/1985...
Traded from Chicago to St. Louis on 5/18/1986 (Going to STL: P Frank Viola. Going to CHC: P Bert Blyleven, P Jeff Fassero, 2B Luis Alicea, CF Lance Johnson)...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 10/1/1986, going 4-0, 1.61...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
10/7/1988: Signed a contract extension with St. Louis, $5,050,000 per year, for 4 years.
